picsItem.feature: Does the device implement the Dishwasher Alarm Cluster as a server?
Does the device implement the Dishwasher Alarm Cluster as a client?
Does the device implement the Mask attribute?
Does the device implement the Latch attribute?
Does the device implement the State attribute?
Does the device implement the Supported attribute?
Does the device implement the Notify event_?
Does the device implement receiving the Reset command?
Does the device implement receiving the ModifyEnabledAlarms command?
Does the device support the Reset command
Can the Dishwasher Alarm Cluster attribute changed by physical control at the device?
Does the device support the Inflow alarm?

status.cond: DISHALM.S AND (NOT (DISHALM.S.M.DrainAlarmSupported)) AND (NOT (DISHALM.S.M.DoorAlarmSupported)) AND (NOT (DISHALM.S.M.TempLowAlarmSupported)) AND (NOT (DISHALM.S.M.TempHighAlarmSupported)) AND (NOT (DISHALM.S.M.WaterLevelAlarmSupported))
DISHALM.S.M.DrainAlarmSupported OR DISHALM.S.M.DoorAlarmSupported OR DISHALM.S.M.TempLowAlarmSupported OR DISHALM.S.M.TempHighAlarmSupported OR DISHALM.S.M.WaterLevelAlarmSupported

picsItem.feature: Does the device support the Drain alarm?
